title: Sony RM-EZ4 2-Device Universal Remote with Big Buttons
description: Sony RM-EZ4 Multi Brand Universal Renite Controls TVand cable box; Simplified functions - easy to use; Large buttons for easy operation; Compatible with most of major brands. Features: * Simplified functions; easy-to-use  * Ergonomic design; easy-to-hold  * Large buttons for easy operation * Controls TV and cable box  * Low-cost replacement for lost or broken units  * 3-minute Memory Backup
